title: How Quick-Step Is Plotting to Reclaim its Classics Crown: ‘We Lost a Little, But We Are Still There’
content:
'The big goal is always the classics': Tradition runs deep in the Belgian squad, with Luke Lamperti set for classics debut at Kuurne-Brussel-Kuurne.

Read the full article at How Quick-Step Is Plotting to Reclaim its Classics Crown: ‘We Lost a Little, But We Are Still There’ on Velo.
author: ahood
